content: When you have the Legendary Immortal Blessing Gourd equipped, your health recovery is actually halved. However, your attack is increased for a short duration after using it, allowing you to deal significantly more damage than you would normally. This is a huge tradeoff, however, so it won't be for everyone, and you may want to opt for another Gourd in the game or the traditional Old Gourd, which you can upgrade to the Supreme Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Immortal_Blessing_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Immortal Blessing Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
When you have the Legendary Immortal Blessing Gourd equipped, your health recovery is actually halved. However, your attack is increased for a short duration after using it, allowing you to deal significantly more damage than you would normally. This is a huge tradeoff, however, so it won't be for everyone, and you may want to opt for another Gourd in the game or the traditional Old Gourd, which you can upgrade to the Supreme Gourd.
